code: @Override protected Endpoint createEndpoint(String uri, String remaining, Map<String, Object> parameters) throws Exception {     AtomixMessagingConfiguration configuration = this.configuration.copy().     // Bind options to the configuration object     setConfigurationProperties(configuration, parameters).     AtomixMessagingEndpoint endpoint = new AtomixMessagingEndpoint(uri, this, remaining).     endpoint.setConfiguration(configuration).     setProperties(endpoint, parameters).     return endpoint. }

// ********************************************** // Properties // ********************************************** public AtomixMessagingConfiguration getConfiguration() {     return this.configuration. }
/**  * The shared component configuration  */ public void setConfiguration(AtomixMessagingConfiguration configuration) {     this.configuration = configuration. }
